helmet.flavorText: "I cast off my carapace to be reborn, just like our glorious Riis."  â€”Atraks-1, Fallen Exo
It reflects whatever it sees, no matter how ugly.
Judge us by the enemies we've made.

"I don't know what it means
That I am so sad
A legend of bygone days
That I cannot keep out of my mind." â€”Die Lorelei, Heinrich Heine
"The Traveler has shown us that what was broken can be reformed, becoming better than it was before." â€”Commander Zavala

gauntlet.flavorText: The equations balance thus: you are diminished, and I am exalted. You are broken, and I am made strong.
Ice can grind mountains to dust. These will get the job done.
"Trust me, you don't want to be there when he lands."
"There is no warrior fiercer than one shielding hatchlings from harm."  â€”Eliksni proverb
"To gain power, you must sacrifice. Exos have known this long before the Guardians' rise."  â€”Taeko-3
Osmium's existence requires near-divine interventionâ€”a supernovaâ€”to forge.
Always keep one up your sleeve.

chest.flavorText: The higher your flight, the faster your dive.
"No great wonder can stand forever if it is constructed on a lie." â€”Alexei
See the danger, even when it cannot see you.
The lightning from the farthest cloud strikes the hardest.
There is no strength in letting go.

leg.flavorText: The nature of the secant is to intercept a curve, a role all human relationships likewise fill.
Feast on the sky. Gorge yourself until all starlight has been gnawed to blackâ€”then the cosmos will tremble with your roar.
Those who walk through fire have burned away their fear.
Built for swift movement, they provide unexpected and decisive social benefits.
The manifestation of pseudophotons and impossible math.
